author: mcmurma
content:
Strangely enough I have a new pair of eyeglasses waiting for me at this very moment. They have been ready since last week, but I havn't had the time to go pick them up. Contacts for me have never been an option I considered. The very idea of sticking something into my eye is beyond me. RK surgery one day, maybe, but contacts... gads no.

Now, this image is one that appeals to me on several levels. Color (still with the blue and gold, I see. I'm not complaining mind you, just making an observation!) and the simple, yet powerful composition. Nuff said.
